Summary

  • Tunnel(s) Used: The number of VPN tunnels in use
  • Tunnel Available: The number of available VPN tunnels
  • Detail: Click Detail for more information. Click Refresh to update the data, or click Close to return to the VPN Summary page. The WAN IP addresses will be displayed. For each VPN tunnel, the No., Name, Status, Phase 2 Enc/ Auth/Grp, Local Group, Remote Group, and Remote Gateway will be displayed.
